movieData.title: Tanhaji
movieData.description: A historical drama depicting the life of Tanaji Malusare, a military leader in the army of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj.
movieData.producer: Ajay Devgn, Bhushan Kumar, Krishan Kumar

movieData.title: Baaghi 3
movieData.description: A man embarks on a bloody rampage to save his kidnapped brother.
movieData.producer: Sajid Nadiadwala

movieData.title: hindi movie
movieData.description: A heartwarming and hilarious story of a father and his daughter who dreams of studying abroad.
movieData.producer: Dinesh Vijan

movieData.title: Gulabo Sitabo
movieData.description: A quirky comedy about a landlord and his tenant squabbling over an old mansion.
movieData.producer: Ronnie Lahiri, Sheel Kumar

movieData.title: Dil Bechara
movieData.description: A poignant love story about two cancer patients who find solace and joy in each other's company.
movieData.producer: Fox Star Studios

movieData.title: Ludo
movieData.description: An anthology film that weaves together stories of four different people connected by unforeseen circumstances.
movieData.producer: Anurag Basu, Bhushan Kumar, Divya Khosla Kumar

movieData.title: Coolie No. 1
movieData.description: A comedy about a matchmaker trying to pair off a rich man's daughter with a coolie who pretends to be a wealthy man.
movieData.producer: Vashu Bhagnani, Jackky Bhagnani

movieData.title: Master
movieData.description: An action thriller about an alcoholic professor who takes up a teaching job in a juvenile home, where he clashes with a gangster who uses the children for criminal activities.
movieData.producer: Xavier Britto

movieData.title: Judas and the Black Messiah
movieData.description: Based on true events, this film tells the story of Fred Hampton, chairman of the Illinois chapter of the Black Panther Party in late-1960s Chicago, and how FBI informant William O'Neal infiltrated the party to gather intelligence.
movieData.producer: Shaka King, Charles D. King, Ryan Coogler

movieData.title: Radhe: Your Most Wanted Bhai
movieData.description: An action-packed thriller about an encounter specialist who takes on the drug mafia in Mumbai.
movieData.producer: Salman Khan, Sohail Khan, Atul Agnihotri, Nikhil Namit

movieData.title: Shershaah
movieData.description: A biographical war film based on the life of Captain Vikram Batra, an Indian Army officer who was posthumously awarded the Param Vir Chakra, India's highest and most prestigious award for valour, for his actions during the 1999 Kargil War.
movieData.producer: Karan Johar, Hiroo Yash Johar, Apoorva Mehta, Shabbir Boxwala, Ajay Shah, Himanshu Gandhi

movieData.title: Bhuj: The Pride of India
movieData.description: A war action film based on the 1971 Indo-Pakistani War, where IAF Squadron Leader Vijay Karnik and his team reconstructed the Bhuj airbase with the help of 300 local women.
movieData.producer: Bhushan Kumar, Ginny Khanuja, Krishan Kumar, Kumar Mangat Pathak, Bunny Sanghavi, Vajir Singh, Abhishek Dudhaiya, Kishan Kumar, Raj Kumar Gupta, Gary Grewal

movieData.title: Sooryavanshi
movieData.description: An action-packed cop drama that follows the story of an anti-terrorism squad officer who must save Mumbai from a deadly terrorist attack.
movieData.producer: Rohit Shetty, Hiroo Yash Johar, Karan Johar, Aruna Bhatia, Apoorva Mehta

movieData.title: Jersey
movieData.description: A sports drama film that follows the story of a talented but failed cricketer who decides to return to cricket in his late thirties driven by the desire to represent the Indian cricket team and fulfil his son's wish for a jersey as a gift.
movieData.producer: Allu Aravind, Aman Gill, Dil Raju

movieData.title: RRR
movieData.description: An epic historical fiction film set in the 1920s pre-independent era, where two revolutionaries unite to fight against the British Raj and their oppressive rule.
movieData.producer: D. V. V. Danayya

movieData.title: Brahmastra
movieData.description: A fantasy adventure film that follows the journey of Shiva, the mythological figure who embodies the ultimate source of light, love, and wisdom.
movieData.producer: Karan Johar, Hiroo Yash Johar, Apoorva Mehta

movieData.title: Pathaan
movieData.description: An action thriller that follows the story of a covert operative who is on a mission to eliminate a dangerous threat while dealing with his own personal demons.
movieData.producer: Aditya Chopra

movieData.title: KGF: Chapter 2
movieData.description: A sequel to the 2018 film KGF: Chapter 1, this movie continues the story of Rocky, a young man who rises from the streets of Bombay to the power corridors of the gold mines in Kolar.
movieData.producer: Vijay Kiragandur

movieData.title: Animal
movieData.description: A dark thriller that explores the complexities of human nature and relationships through the story of a dysfunctional family.
movieData.producer: Bhushan Kumar, Krishan Kumar, Murad Khetani, Sandeep Reddy Vanga

movieData.title: Gangubai Kathiawadi
movieData.description: Based on the life of Gangubai Kothewali, a powerful woman in the 1960s who became the matriarch of Kamathipura and one of the most revered and powerful brothel owners in Mumbai.
movieData.producer: Sanjay Leela Bhansali, Jayantilal Gada
